title: Studio Apartment/Private Bathroom Plus All Utilities Included
posting_body: ['LOWER LEVEL PRIVATE STUDIO AVAILABLE NOW!!!', '*All utilities are included', '*Free washing and drying', '*Free High Speed 1000mg Wi-Fi (Works with Fire stick, Xbox, PlayStation, laptop etc.)', '*Kitchen equipped with refrigerator, stovetop and microwave.', 'Fully stocked vending machine on the first floor.', 'Westside of Detroit', 'Studios About 18x21', 'Lots of closets.', 'Freshly painted white walls w/Black hardwood flooring.', 'Big Private Bathroom w/Walk in Shower', 'MOVE IN TODAY!!!!', 'NO CREDIT CHECK!!!!', '*RENT PAYMENT OPTIONS*', 'Studio apartment rents for $1000 Monthly or $250 weekly or $500 biweekly (Plus a one time $1000 move in fee ) 6Month Lease/Month to Month', 'NO CREDIT CHECK!!!!', 'IT THEY GO FAST… CALL ASAP', 'THE WAITLIST FOR ROOMS IS NOW OPEN', 'AND WE HAVE 1 LOWER LEVEL PRIVATE STUDIO AVAILABLE NOW… don’t hesitate,', 'Call now', 'show contact info', 'MR.KNIGHT']
